title: Russian president elections from abroad
text:
In 2024 the results of elections of Russian president was reported as high as 87%1 . That is inside Russia where freedom of speech is limited. Abroad the result is 72%.
Let’s look at demographics, who is voting?
Military - all voters at polling stations in military units relative to all voters in country.

You might have seen in the news long ques in Europe of people who wanted to vote. What happened with turnout?

The biggest majority of countries are military or unrecognized states.

In case we look at dynamics of voting Figure 1



Figure 1: Amount of people per country (X) vs results for Putin (Y)


In 2018 a lot of against voters didn’t came.

Here you can have a look at the map. Explain tooltip.
